sub_title: International Freelance Actuary / AI+ML / Business Analyst / Risk Expert
summary:
Fast and deep analysis of complex problems is my strongest skill. I have deep knowledge of Insurance, Banking, ICT, Artificial intelligence and Process improvement. I am eager to develop my skills in other areas too.

I get my job satisfaction from challenging activities. Understanding and solving, advising senior management and coaching colleagues is what I do best.

Special characteristics describing my personal skills:
- Eager, creative, out of the box thinking and analytical problemsolver. 
- A strong drive to learn and adapt fast to new skills and information.
- Stable, delivering quality in stressful conditions too.

profile_positions.description:
2nd Line of Defense Risk Management, reporting to the board and to the supervisor. 

Risk Governance group level (Enterprise Risk Management): model governance / risk framework / risk priority / GDPR / COSO / process improvement; 
Underwriting Risk Argenta Assurance Belgium and Underwriting Risk Argenta Life Netherlands: Solvency II - risk report ORSA with forward looking at financial risk, operational risk and underwriting risk, budget control.
Risk assessments on all risks and preparation of risk reports. Chapters of risk profile in the RSR-report Solo / Conso and in the SFCR-report. Maintain contact with other company divisions and external parties. Advisor in actuarial projects.
Sr expert VBA models with Excel and Powerpoint; SAS Enterprise Guide / SQL.
